```{r}
# Load Data
setwd(directory_data_LFS)

# Create a vector of file names
files <- paste0("LFS_", 84:99, ".dta")

# create empty dataframes
df_84_86 <- data.frame()
df_87_95<- data.frame()
df_96_95<- data.frame()

# Loop through each file, read the data, and assign to a variable
for (i in 84:99) {
    file <- paste0("LFS_", i, ".dta")
    data <- read_dta(file)
    data <- data[, order(names(data))]
    
    # if i<87 merge data with df_84_86, else if i>87 and i<96 merge data with df_87_95, else merge data with df_96_99
    if (i < 87) {
      bind_rows(df_87_95, next_df)
    } else if (i < 96) {
      data <- subset(data, select = -IW15_Yearly)
      names(data)[names(data) == "IW10_Yearly"] <- "IW_Yearly"
      assign(paste0("df_", i), data)
    } else {
    assign(paste0("df_", i), data)}
}

# remove variable data
rm(data)
```

```{r}
df_names <- paste0("df_", 87:95)

# Initialize the final data frame with the first data frame
df_87_95 <- get(df_names[1])

  next_df <- get(df_name)
  df_87_95<- bind_rows(df_87_95, next_df)
}

df_87_95 <- subset(df_87_95, select = -IW15_Yearly)
```
